Concealed Greatness.desc: Gloves with reality grabbing technology made possible by sensors in the exposed underlining.

Real Touch.desc: The standard edition. Pearls of reality-crossing transistors smatter a red glove.

Incognito Gloobers.desc: Small beads replace big pearls in this discreet edition.

Hidden Power Gloves.desc: One large sensor on each glove makes this pair functional and affordable.

Boxing Gloves.desc: Decorative outside replaced with insulation and a hard coating for durability.

The Electro Force.desc: Electromagnetic field senses position of hands and fingers allowing for freer movement.

Diver's Choice.desc: Swimming on the other plane? Get in the pool for a more realistic simulation and bring your gloves too.

Dot Adapter.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 10 feet of range

Phone Jack Adapter 1.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 15 feet of range

Phone Jack Adapter 2.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 20 feet of range

Mouse Jack.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 25 feet of range

USB Jack 1.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 40 feet of range

USB Jack 2.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 55 feet of range

The Reality Wave.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 100 feet of range

The Reality Rift.desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 175 feet of range

Multi-Colored, Clear Curtains.desc: You're just trying out this VR thing, but it's too bright to see anything.

White Curtains.desc: Now it's dark enough to play.

Grey Curtains.desc: Those rays really come down in the summer.

Greyer Grey Curtains.desc: No more fooling around. You need it dim.

Greyest Gray Curtains.desc: Your soul is fading away. Grey is of the devel and you flock to it.

Black Tape.desc: Tape down the curtains. The light burns!

Bricks and Mortar.desc: Vampire status achieved. The sun has started to burn, so windows are no longer necessary.
